backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend actor with no methods or state defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the LinkedIn profile photo was downloaded and saved as a local static asset, and HeroSection was updated to use it.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads Inter and Merriweather fonts from Google Fonts and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles all CV sections with TopNav and a personalized footer message from Vibhanshu.
frontend/src/components/cv/ContactSectio: Renders a grid of contact method cards (email, phone, LinkedIn, Google Drive, website, Twitter) filtered to only show items with valid hrefs.
frontend/src/components/cv/EducationSect: Displays a list of education entries as cards with degree, institution, dates, location, and optional bullet-point details.
frontend/src/components/cv/ExperienceSec: Renders a vertical timeline of work experience entries with role, company, optional location, and description bullet points.
frontend/src/components/cv/HeroSection.t: Hero section displaying the profile photo (with fallback to the local generated asset), name, title, location, summary, and CTA buttons for contact and projects.
frontend/src/components/cv/ProjectsSecti: Displays a responsive grid of project cards with title, description, technology badges, and links to live demo and GitHub.
frontend/src/components/cv/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper that applies consistent padding, max-width, and a styled heading to any CV section.
frontend/src/components/cv/SkillsSection: Renders skill categories in a two-column grid, each card listing skills as styled badge spans.
frontend/src/components/cv/TopNav.tsx: A fixed top navigation bar component with smooth-scroll links to CV sections, active section highlighting via scroll detection, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/data/cv.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all CV data structures and exports a static `cvData` object containing Vibhanshu Meshram's hero, experience, education, skills, projects, and contact information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, using an anonymous actor when unauthenticated or an identity-bound actor when logged in, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: An intentionally empty placeholder file noting that no backend queries are needed since all CV data comes from the static data file.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoFromCvData.ts: A hook that dynamically sets the document title and injects meta tags (description, Open Graph, Twitter Card) based on the CV hero data for SEO purposes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining a warm earthy OKLCH color palette with CSS custom properties for both light and dark modes, plus base body and HTML styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` into the DOM root.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based colors, font families, border radii, box shadows, accordion animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the current version, existing features, and the active task of downloading a LinkedIn profile photo and using it as a local static asset in the HeroSection component.
